title: When She's Ready
description: To get amnesty on a remote farm planet, ex-con Tassar has to marry an alien – specifically, a strange looking creature called a ‘human’. When he sees gorgeous, delicate Leilani, though, all of his plans change. He wants more than just a marriage of convenience. He wants her forever, but only when she’s ready.This book was available in audiobook format on the Read Me Romance Podcast during the week of July 1, 2019 - July 5, 2019.
author: Ruby Dixon
